name: Connexagons
description:
A similar game to my Tile Puzzle game (https://glassblade.itch.io/tile-puzzle), which is itself similar to the mobile game "Infinity Loop".

Connexagons features hexagonal tiles instead of square ones, and is my first project involving Unity. Aside from those differences, the concept is identical to the Tile Puzzle game: you must tidy up all the loose ends, by rotating the tiles in-place. Use the left and right mouse buttons to rotate the tiles clockwise and counter-clockwise respectively.

Open-source project (MIT license): https://gitlab.com/rsethc/connexagons
